49thIT Legal Notice
====================

Site Overview
-------------
- **Title:** 49thIT  
- **URL:** https://49thit.com  
- **Tagline:** An Alaskan serial adventure in IT...

Contact
-------
For general questions, collaboration inquiries, or reuse requests, email **49thit@gmail.com**.

AI Usage Statement
------------------
No AI was used in the writing of the content of 49thIT. All story and
authorship are 100% human-invented.

AI tools and agents were used in the development of website code, imagery, post tags, and general research/brainstorming.

Fictional Narrative Disclaimer
------------------------------
49thIT is a fictional narrative inspired by modern-day technology work in Alaska. Events, institutions, and individuals—including public officials—are portrayed in a dramatized manner. Any resemblance to real persons (living or dead) or real incidents is coincidental or used for creative commentary, and should not be construed as statements of fact or slander. References to public figures are for storytelling purposes only and do not imply endorsement or association.
